abstract: Colonial Properties Trust said Thursday that it filed paperwork that will allow it to sell up to $50 million worth of its common shares through an ”at-the-market” offering, in which a broker executes a sale at the best price currently available, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Colonial Properties Trust said Thursday that it filed paperwork that will allow it to sell up to $50 million worth of its common shares through an ”at-the-market” offering, in which a broker executes a sale at the best price currently available, T...
lead_paragraph: Colonial Properties Trust said Thursday that it filed paperwork that would allow it to sell up to $50 million worth of its common shares through an ”at-the-market” offering, in which a broker executes a sale at the best price currently available, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Colonial to Sell Up to $50 Million of Stock

abstract: Kenneth R. Feinberg believes the compensation paid to Wells Fargo’s chief executive for 2009 “raises serious questions,” he told CNBC on Thursday.
snippet: Kenneth R. Feinberg believes the compensation paid to Wells Fargo’s chief executive for 2009 “raises serious questions,” he told CNBC on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Pay czar Kenneth R. Feinberg believes the compensation paid to Wells Fargo‘s chief executive for 2009 “raises serious questions,” he told CNBC on Thursday.

headline.main: Wells Chief’s Pay Raises Questions, Czar Says
